column1: Some Comments may not appear here because of their privacy settings

column8: Your translation choices in the 21st century are helpful.  I wonder how the words might be translated in the 22nd century?
Yes Heaven is raised which no eyes had ever seen nor could one visualize.....
Sheikh Mohammed Awal Alhajj Salam Tagoe

Brilliant interpretation.  Qurán 51:47 on an expanding universe is clear. Qurán on dark matter 13:02 is equally obvious but is a brilliant interpretation.  Now where does the Qurán refer to "entanglement" beyond space and time and beyond all quantum physics?
Love this statement, “Quran is a fixed text with dynamic meaning”
